text: @FLOTUS Ummm..yeah sure. Your husband prefers that we open the country and let the virus ‘wash over’ the citizens so those who survive can develop antibodies against #COVID19. The dead are just collateral damage. #TrumpPandemicFailure #TrumpBurialPits #TrumpOwnsEveryDeath #CoronaVirusUSA
